○×テスト: (まるばつテスト) - true-false test; yes-no test
○○: (まるまる) - symbol used as a placeholder (either because a number of other words could be used in that position, or because of censorship); certain/unnamed/undisclosed/unidentified
◎: (にじゅうまる) - double circle; 'good work' (equiv. of silver star awarded to children at school)
々: (どうのじてん) - repetition of kanji (sometimes voiced)
〆: (しめ) - tie up/bind/fastening/tightening; sum/total amount/total; judo choking (strangling) techniques; last meal eaten when going restaurant hopping; completion/conclusion/rounding off; counter for bundles/counter for faggots/counter for bundles of 2000 sheets of paper; (esp. 〆) end mark/closure mark
〆切: (しめきり) - (not 閉め切り, etc.) deadline/closing/cut-off/end; (not 閉め切り, etc.) cofferdam; (not 〆切, etc.) closed (door, window, etc.)
〆切り: (しめきり) - (not 閉め切り, etc.) deadline/closing/cut-off/end; (not 閉め切り, etc.) cofferdam; (not 〆切, etc.) closed (door, window, etc.)
〆切る: (しめきる) - to close up; to shut up (e.g. behind doors); to cut off (e.g. because a deadline has expired)
〆切日: (しめきりび) - time limit; closing day; deadline
〆粕: (しめかす) - oil cake; scrap cake
〇: (まる) - circle (sometimes used for zero); (ant: ×・ばつ・1) 'correct' (when marking); symbol used as a placeholder (either because a number of other words could be used in that position, or because of censorship); period/full stop; maru mark/semivoiced sound/p-sound
〇×: (まるばつ) - circle and cross; right and wrong (answers); true-false
〇〇: (まるまる) - symbol used as a placeholder (either because a number of other words could be used in that position, or because of censorship); certain/unnamed/undisclosed/unidentified
〒: (ゆうびん) - mail service/postal service/mail/post; mail/postal matter/postal items
あ: (アッ) - Ah! (expression of surprise, recollection, etc.)/Oh!; Hey! (to get someone's attention)
ああ: (ああ) - like that (used for something or someone distant from both speaker and listener); so
ああいう: (ああゆう) - that sort of; like that
ああいう風に: (ああいうふうに) - in that way; like that
ああいった: (ああいった) - that sort of; like that
ああした: (ああした) - that sort of; like that
ああして: (ああして) - like that; that way
ああしろこうしろ: (ああしろこうしろ) - do this, do that; dos and don'ts
ああそうそう: (ああそうそう) - oh yes!; I remember/Oh, now I remember
ああだこうだ: (ああだこうだ) - this, that and the other; this and that
ああでもないこうでもない: (ああでもないこうでもない) - humming and hawing; shilly-shallying
ああやって: (ああやって) - like that; that way
ああゆう: (ああゆう) - that sort of; like that
ああん: (アーン) - opening wide/saying aah; crying loudly/wailing/balling
ああ言えばこう言う: (ああいえばこういう) - to have a comeback (i.e. a reason, or rationalization) for every remark
あい: (あい) - yes; wind that blows from north to north-east during spring and summer along the coast of the sea of Japan
あいうえお: (アイウエオ) - Japanese syllabary; kana; aiueo
あいうえお表: (あいうえおひょう) - Japanese syllable table
あいうえお順: (あいうえおじゅん) - aiueo-order; order of the kana syllabary
あいさつ回り: (あいさつまわり) - courtesy call; making the rounds
あいそ笑: (あいそわらい) - insincere smile; ingratiating smile; forced smile
あいそ笑い: (あいそわらい) - insincere smile; ingratiating smile; forced smile
あいた口が塞がらぬ: (あいたくちがふさがらぬ) - surprising; shocking; jaw-dropping
あいた口も塞がらぬ: (あいたくちもふさがらぬ) - surprising; shocking; jaw-dropping
あいだる: (あいだる) - (v2r-s,vi)   to behave like a spoilt child
あいてにとって不足はない: (あいてにとってふそくはない) - good match for an opponent; worthy (e.g. rival)
あいの子: (あいのこ) - person of mixed parentage; crossbreed; Eurasian; mulatto; hybrid
あいの風: (あいのかぜ) - wind that blows from north to north-east during spring and summer along the coast of the Sea of Japan
あいまい制御: (あいまいせいぎょ) - fuzzy control
あいまい検索: (あいまいけんさく) - fuzzy reference; ambiguous search; ambiguous retrieval
あいや: (あいや) - hey!; excuse me!; wait a moment
あい変らず: (あいかわらず) - as ever; as usual; the same; still
あい変わらず: (あいかわらず) - as ever; as usual; the same; still
あうんの呼吸: (あうんのこきゅう) - the harmonizing, mentally and physically, of two parties engaged in an activity; singing from the same hymn-sheet; dancing to the same beat
あえの風: (あえのかぜ) - wind that blows from north to north-east during spring and summer along the coast of the Sea of Japan
あえ物: (あえもの) - chopped fish, shellfish or vegetables, dressed with (miso or other) sauce
あおぎ見る: (あおぎみる) - to look upwards; to look up
あおた: (あおた) - blue shark (Prionace glauca, species of circumglobal requiem shark)
あおなぎ: (あおなぎ) - shark (esp. the blue shark, Prionace glauca)
あおば: (あおば) - (former) regular (stops at every station) Tohoku-line Shinkansen
あおり立てる: (あおりたてる) - to flap strongly; to stir up fiercely
あかし暮らす: (あかしくらす) - to spend one's days and nights doing ...
あかの他人: (あかのたにん) - complete stranger; total stranger
あかまた: (あかまた) - Ryukyu odd-tooth snake (Dinodon semicarinatum)
あかまち: (あかまち) - queen snapper (Etelis coruscans); ruby snapper; flame snapper
あかんべ: (アカンベー) - (from 赤目)  facial gesture of pulling one's eyelid down and sticking out one's tongue
あかんべい: (アカンベー) - (from 赤目)  facial gesture of pulling one's eyelid down and sticking out one's tongue
あかんべえ: (アカンベー) - (from 赤目)  facial gesture of pulling one's eyelid down and sticking out one's tongue
あかんべー: (アカンベー) - (from 赤目)  facial gesture of pulling one's eyelid down and sticking out one's tongue
あがぁな: (あがぁな) - (Hiroshima dialect)  such (about something or someone distant from both speaker and listener, or about a situation unfamiliar to both speaker and listener); so; that; sort of
あがり性: (あがりしょう) - stage fright; social anxiety disorder; social phobia
あがり湯: (あがりゆ) - clean hot bath water for rinsing
あがり症: (あがりしょう) - stage fright; social anxiety disorder; social phobia
あがり目: (あがりめ) - eyes slanted upward; rising tendency
あきれて物が言えない: (あきれてものがいえない) - utterly scandalized

あきれ顔: (あきれがお) - amazed or stunned expression
あき場所: (あきばしょ) - {sumo} autumn (fall) (September) tournament, held in Tokyo
あくが強い: (あくがつよい) - having a strong alkaline taste/harsh to the taste; excessively strong-willed/fiercely individualistic/strongly idiosyncratic
あくの強い: (あくのつよい) - harsh tasting/strongly alkaline tasting; excessively strong-willed/fiercely individualistic/strongly idiosyncratic
あくる日: (あくるひ) - next day; following day
あくを取る: (あくをとる) - to skim the scum from broth or liquid; to skim (a liquid)
